subject: Hello Beloved,
body:
Hello Beloved,
My name is Juliana Patrick and I was born in Louisiana not far from
Houston Texas but married to my husband Robert Patrick from the
United Kingdom who was working and living in USA as of then, but we
finally move down to United Kingdom, my husband's home town in Wales,
the Northern part . I wrote you this letter because I need your
assistance.
I grew up in an orphanage and was married to my late husband for 26
years without a child and my husband died as a result of a road
accident in 2018. I am 68years I am currently suffering from liver
cancer and my health is deteriorating speedily. Just yesterday, the
The specialist handling my case told me that I have a few days to live on
earth and I became so worried because of the sad news he gave me.
Now, I want my inheritance funds to be used for charity works. My
instinct leads me to write this letter to you and seek your assistance
to handle this task in the way I will instruct you and maybe God will
consider me worthy of his presence when I die.
If you accept to handle the task, I shall give my inheritance funds
($20M USD) to you to start the charity work and I shall leave you with
instructions on how to manage the funds.
I wait to hear from you through this email: 
patrickjuliana44@gmail.com
 as
soon as possible.
Regards,
Juliana Patrick

subject: Re: Hello Beloved,
body:
Hello Juliana Patrick,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It's truly admirable that you want to use your funds for charity work. I'd be interested in knowing more about the kind of charity work you have in mind. Could you please share more details about it? 

Also, could you tell me a bit more about how you envision managing these funds? I would like to understand better so I can help in the best way possible.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: Re: Hello Beloved,
body:
Dear  Enest ,

I am indeed glad to be in contact with you even though this medium of
communication (internet) has been grossly abused by some people making
it difficult for others once with genuine struggle to correspond and
exchange views without skepticism. I am quite happy with your
enthusiasm towards the charity work, my dear I am a dying old woman,
that lived a kind of life that was not really pleasing to my God, and
people around me, and because my doctor says I have a few weeks to live.

It may interest you to know how I got your name, in my search on
On the internet of whom to trust, I came across three names, but after three
days of fasting and prayers, your name came first. That was how you were
emailed.

Therefore, it will please me now that I am still alive to see you use
These little funds of mine to do charity work on my behalf, reach out
the poor in the society, with that I believe my God will be happy with
me, that is the only way you can help me . In View of this, I would
like to inform you that this transaction will
take normal banking procedures, so I will appreciate if you can give
me more details of  yourself and your profession or eventually
relevant information regarding charity organizations as much as you
know.
 I have a limited time according to my doctorâ€™s report, therefore I
intend to use every bit of it wisely, meanwhile, I will love to have
any form of your picture or id to identify who you are, once after
this is done, I shall  wait to hear from you , before passing your
information to my attorney (Barrister)he is a good man, he has been my
personal lawyer
for 15  years, he  was manages my properties when the going was fine,
he will guide and direct you
best way (Legally) on how to go for the claims on my behalf, so please
I need to be convinced that you can be able to carry out this good
work for God, if you are empowered financially.

Attached is  the copy of my picture taken on my hospital bed; standing
beside me is Doctor Bill Francis, please confirm your telephone number to
me , I would
like to talk to you on the phone.


With warm regards,

Mrs. Juliana  Patrick

subject: Re: Hello Beloved,
body:
Hello Mrs. Juliana Patrick,

I'm truly touched by your message and the strength you're showing in such a difficult time. It's admirable that even in this situation, you're thinking about helping others. I must say, it's quite a coincidence that my name came up first in your search. 

I'm just an ordinary person with a simple job and lifestyle. I don't have any professional experience in charity work, but I've always believed in helping others whenever possible. I've participated in local community service activities and believe that every little bit helps.

However, I must clarify that while I am willing to help, I cannot provide personal details like pictures or IDs over the internet due to privacy concerns. But rest assured, my intentions are genuine and sincere.

Could you please share more about the kind of charity work you want me to do? Are there any specific causes or communities you want me to focus on? Also, could you tell me more about Barrister? How will he guide me through this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ernest
